participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Sociable and adventurous, loves to have fun and socialize with friends.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, enjoys gaming and quirky hobbies.
participant_2.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
